name: My Gunshop [Prototype Version]
description:
Be a good son and take care of the gun shop for your parents, I know you would probably prefer to take a walk in the city or just keep training shooting those targets.

any comments, ideas, and suggestions are welcome but remember it's just a prototype to validate the idea.
